attributes.action: Create a UK visa scheme for Palestinians like “Homes for Ukraine”
attributes.additional_details: Palestinians face mass displacement, destroyed homes and restricted access to food, water and medical care. In 2022 the UK created Homes for Ukraine, proving a humane visa route and community sponsorship can be delivered quickly. A similar, non-discriminatory scheme for Palestinians would save lives, enable family reunion, and let approved UK sponsors provide safe accommodation and support.
attributes.background: Create an emergency ‘Homes for Palestine’ route: a UK visa and sponsorship scheme modelled on Homes for Ukraine. Provide fee-free visas, family reunion, and safe routes so UK residents can sponsor Palestinians fleeing war and those at risk.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Create a 'Homes for Palestine' Sponsorship and Visa Scheme" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/724433
